sourcesContent:
<template>
  <n-modal
    v-model:show="showModal"
    class="custom-card"
    preset="card"
    :style="bodyStyle"
    title="卡片预设"
    size="huge"
    :bordered="false"
    :segmented="segmented"
  >
    <template #header-extra>
      噢!
    </template>
    内容
    <template #footer>
      尾部
    </template>
  </n-modal>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent, ref } from "vue";

export default defineComponent({
    methods:{
        show(){
        this.showModal=true
        }
    },
  setup() {
      defineExpose({ show })
    return {
      bodyStyle: {
        width: "600px"
      },
      segmented: {
        content: "soft",
        footer: "soft"
      },
      showModal: ref(false)
    };
  }
});

</script>

<style>

</style>
